file_content.text:
Congratulations on reaching level 50!
The galaxy is fraught with danger, and epic adventures await you on distant worlds: Flashpoints, Operations, and more. You will need powerful equipment in order to face these challenges, so let's get you geared up!
Use this datapad to grant the Advanced Gear mission, then follow the instructions to collect your new equipment.

Your equipment is already looking better! With a full set of Tionese gear (Rating 126), you should be ready to take on some of the toughest challenges in the galaxy!
You can queue up for Hard Mode Flashpoints or Story Mode Operations using the Group Finder tool, which is located just above your mini-map. This is a great way to earn Black Hole Commendations, which can be used to purchase some of the best equipment that is currently available (Rating 146).
Good luck!
